title: Zelenskyy appeals to allies to keep up aid as Germany pledges new weapons package
creator: The Associated Press
content: BERLIN — President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said Friday it’s important that allies’ aid to Ukraine doesn’t decrease next year as he received a pledge of a new weapons package from German Chancellor Olaf Scholz on a European tour meant to win backing for his “victory plan” aimed at ending the war with Russia. Zelenskyy arrived in Berlin after stops Thursday in London, Paris and Rome on a tour arranged after a planned summit Saturday with U.S. President Joe Biden and other allied leaders was derailed by Hurricane Milton. Scholz noted that Germany is Ukraine’s biggest military supporter in Europe and the second-biggest behind the United States, and said “it will stay that way.” Scholz emphasized Berlin’s continued focus on helping Kyiv with air defense. And he said that by the end of the year it will deliver another package of military support worth about $1.5 billion with support from Belgium, Denmark and Norway — including further air defense systems, self-propelled Gepard anti-aircraft guns, tanks, armored vehicles, combat drones, artillery ammunition and radars. “For us, it is very important that aid does not decrease next year,” Zelenskyy said, thanking Scholz for the planned aid. “It must be sufficient to protect people and lives.” This year’s German budget foresees nearly 7.5 billion euros in military aid for Ukraine, while next year’s plan is for 4 billion euros. Berlin hopes a $50 billlion international loan packag e funded by interest on profits from frozen Russian assets...

title: Woman who stabbed classmate to please Slender Man files 3rd release request
creator: The Associated Press
content: WAUKESHA, Wis. — A Wisconsin woman accused of stabbing her classmate to please horror character Slender Man more than a decade ago again asked a judge Friday to release her from a psychiatric hospital. Morgan Geyser, who is now 22 years old, filed a petition with Waukesha County Circuit Judge Michael Bohren seeking her release from the Winnebago Mental Health Institute. The petition marks the third time in the past two years she has asked Bohren to let her out of the facility. She withdrew her first petition two months after filing it in 2022. Bohren denied her second request this past April, saying she remains a risk to the public. The one-page petition doesn’t include arguments for her release. Instead, it cites state laws requiring Bohren to appoint at least one expert within 20 days to examine her and produce a report within 30 days of being appointed. It also requests the judge schedule a hearing, noting that state law requires him to hold one within 30 days of receiving the examiner’s report. Geyser’s attorney, Anthony Cotton, didn’t immediately respond to email and telephone messages Friday morning. Geyser and Anissa Weier were 12 in 2014 when they lured Payton Leutner to a Waukesha park after a sleepover. Geyser stabbed Leutner 19 times while Weier egged her on. Leutner barely survived.

title: Mokslininkas: priešingai, nei daugelis galvoja, eglės nepatenka į komą
creator: Kristina Kanišauskaitė-Šaltmerė
content: Žievėgraužio tipografo užpultas egles pašnekovas lygina su miegančiu lokiu, nes patekusios į nepalankias sąlygas jos visai kaip lokiai laikinai užmiega. Nors yra tvirtinančių, kad jos panyra į komą, bet tai nėra iki galo tikslu, nes susiklosčius palankesnėms aplinkybėms, praėjusus sausrai, jos vėl prisikelia. Taip pat miškotyrininkas apibūdina egles kaip geriausiai prie sausros sąlygų prisitaikančius, itin produktyvius medžius (už egles produktyvesnės tik drebulės). – Šiuo metu nuo tipografo žūstančių eglių gausa įvardijama kaip beprecedentė, net ketvirtadalis Europos eglynų, tikėtina, yra jautrūs tipografo pažaidoms. Kokios laukia pasekmės? Ar čia klimato kaitos padariniai? O gal matytumėte kitas priežastis? – Europoje daugeliu atvejų įveisti gryni eglynai. Rezultatas – blogas ūkininkavimas. Kadangi tai Europos miškai ir meteorologinės sąlygos visai kitos, visai kitos karščio bangos ir trūkumas kritulių, iš ten ir atėjo nelaimės šauksmas dėl eglynų. O mes norime viską ir saviems miškams pritaikyti, kad ir mes tokie patys... Čia galai ir nesueina. Lyginant su Vokietija, mūsų miškas yra natūralus. Nors jų kultūriniai eglynai labai produktyvūs (kelis kartus produktyvesni nei mūsų), jie tapo vėtrų aukomis, o mūsiškiai atsilaikė. Patikėkite, jei mūsų eglėms būtų blogai, jos neaugtų. Bet jos atsikuria puikiai. – Galėtumėte iliustruoti, apie kokius miškų pažeidimus nuo žievėgraužio...

title: Звезда може директно у Лигу шампиона
content: Пауза увелико траје у клупском фудбалу. Навијачи широм света сабирају утиске и воде полемике шта је могло боље у претходних месец дана пре друге репрезентативне паузе у сезони. Поред резултата на домаћој сцени, у фокусу навијача су и учинци љубимаца у три европска такмичења - Лига шампиона, Лига Европе и Лига конференције. Они чији су клубови (не)очекивано нешто боље пласирани на табели, већ „планирају” у којем такмичењу би могао да се задеси њихов клуб. Тако је и у нашој држави. Док бодре селекцију Србије у окршајима са Швајцарском и Шпанијом, навијачи Црвене звезде могу да полемишу из којег кола квалификација ће поново да се надмећу. Могуће је и да црвено-бели поново буду директни учесници. Сјајни резултати претходних сезона у којима је Звезда поред учешћа у Лиги шампиона, играла и у Лиги Европе, омогућили су прошле сезоне премијерно учешће без иједног квалификационог кола. У овој такмичарској години узданице Владана Милојевића својом заслугом добиле шансу да буду део новог формата елитног европског такмичења, а у прва два кола поражени су од Бенфике (1:2) и Интера (0:4). Уколико би се шампионати других земаља сад завршили, Црвена звезда би, захваљујући клупском коефицијенту, директно ушла у Лигу шампиона наредне сезону. Наиме, УЕФА више не омогућава директан пролаз у главни део најбољег и најбогатијег фудбалског такмичења само најбољим и платежно најмоћнијим тимовима Старог континента. Шампион Србије спада у групу тимова који може да обезбеди ново учешће у европској елити...

title: Leubsdorf: Many anti-Trump Republicans won't vote for only person who can defeat him
creator: BY CARL P. LEUBSDORF The Dallas Morning News (TNS)
content: From Arizona to Pennsylvania, prominent Republicans are holding a series of house parties, press conferences and other events to make their voices heard in the final days of the 2024 presidential campaign. But these Republicans, headlined by former Wyoming Rep. Liz Cheney and including many other former GOP officeholders, are not urging the election of their party’s presidential nominee, former President Donald Trump. Rather, they are warning against the dangers of a second Trump term and touting the merits of his Democratic rival, Vice President Kamala Harris. “I have thought deeply about this.” Cheney said at last week’s appearance with Harris in the birthplace of the GOP, Ripon, Wis. “Because of the danger that Donald Trump poses, not only am I not voting for Donald Trump, but I will be voting for Kamala Harris.” Unfortunately, however, Cheney and her fellow Harris backers represent a minority. Most of Trump’s most prominent GOP critics — many of whom have repeatedly warned against his return to office — have refused to take their opposition to the point where it would count the most, by backing the Democratic ticket. Their excuses range from maintaining their influence in what they hope will soon be a post-Trump GOP to ideological disagreement with the Democrats. But their failure to go the last mile and actually support Harris could weaken their anti-Trump stance by denying their votes and their voices to the only candidate who can defeat him. The list includes some of...

title: Viivi Avellanin käytös ravintolassa herätti huomion Singaporessa: poliisit paikalle – puoliso hoiti tilanteen diplomaattisesti
content: Minne katosi Viivi Avellan? Kysymys oli pitkään monien huulissa sen jälkeen, kun uutisankkuri ja tv-ohjelmista tuttu Avellan vuonna 2009 katosi tutkakuvasta. Hämmästelyyn oli syynsä, sillä 2000-luvulla Avellan oli ollut jatkuvasti valokeilassa: kamerat seurasivat häntä kaikkialle – yökerhoista työpaikalle ja julkkistilaisuuksista kotiovelle. Hän ei saanut edes juhlia rauhassa, saati seurustella. – Vietin aivan toisenlaista elämää kuin nykyään, Avellan, 47, kertoo nyt. – Se oli hullua aikaa, kansainvälistynyt yrittäjä jatkaa. Vuonna 2009 Avellan tarpeekseen ja otti hatkat Suomesta. Sittemmin Avellanin elämässä on tapahtunut paljon, mutta hänestä on kuultu harvoin. Ensin Sveitsissä kolme vuotta asunut ja sen jälkeen Singaporeen muuttanut Avellan on saanut nauttia yksityisestä elämästä. Kahdeksan vuoden jälkeen Kaakkois-Aasian kaupunkivaltion persoonalliset ja tiukat säännöt ovat kuitenkin alkaneet ärsyttää sen verran, että on aika muuttaa. Singaporessa eletään Avellanin mukaan omassa turvallisuuden kuplassa. – Singapore on sääntömaa, siis kymmenen kertaa enemmän kuin Suomi. On aika viedä lapset ennen teinivuosia muualle, jossa saavat kokea länsimaisen vähän vapaamman mutta omalla tavallaan kovemman nuoruuden, Avellan kertoo. Perheellä on edessä suuri elämänmuutos, mutta muutokset ovat Avellanille tuttuja. Avellanille on tärkeää vaalia suomalaisia juuriaan. Kotimaiset brändit ovat kotona tuttuja, ja yrittäjä matkustaa...

title: Harris viewed more positively by Hispanic women than by Hispanic men: AP-NORC poll
creator: BY FERNANDA FIGUEROA and LINLEY SANDERS The Associated Press
content: WASHINGTON — A solid majority of Hispanic women have a positive opinion of Vice President Kamala Harris and a negative view of former President Donald Trump , but Hispanic men are more divided on both candidates, according to a recent poll from The Associated Press-NORC Center for Public Affairs Research . Hispanic men are also more likely than Hispanic women to say Trump is the candidate who represents their views on key issues, underscoring the potential importance of this group both candidates have courted aggressively. As the election approaches, the extent to which Trump can erode Harris’ support among Hispanic voters could be an important factor in swing states like Arizona. Hispanic voters are more supportive of the Democrats overall: According to the poll, nearly half identify as Democrats, about one-third as Republicans, and around 2 in 10 as independents. But the poll signals that Hispanic men, while not overwhelmingly in favor of Trump, are more open to his candidacy than Hispanic women — and less open to Harris. Overall, Hispanic voters are about equally likely to say they have a favorable view of Trump and Harris. But there is a gender divide among Hispanic voters on Harris: About 6 in 10 Hispanic women have a somewhat or very favorable opinion of Harris, compared to 45% of Hispanic men. Similarly, about half of Hispanic women voters think Harris would make a good president, compared to only about one-third of Hispanic men. For some voters, one candidate may...

title: Долар поступово дорожчатиме: банкір дав прогноз на середину жовтня
content: У другій половині жовтня, попри зростання інфляційного тиску - нової хвилі зростання споживчих цін, викликаних змінами в оподаткуванні, ситуація на валютному ринку залишатиметься цілком помірною. Про це в коментарі РБК-Україна сказав Тарас Лєсовий, начальник департаменту казначейства Глобус Банку. "Незначні коливання, що відбувалися протягом минулого тижня, будуть збережені. Однак все ж таки, на ринку триватиме, хоч і вельми повільний, але очікуваний процес зростання вартості основних валют ", - сказав він. За його словами, у тижневому вимірі він буде малопомітним або ж, що не виключено, майже статичним. Але у розрізі день до дня коливання відбуватимуться, як у бік зростання, так і в бік зменшення курсів. "Ринок "живий", а дійсний режим "керованої гнучкості" - це збереження ринкових принципів курсоутворення (залежно від співвідношення попиту та пропозиції), хоч і з важливою обмовкою, адже регулятор залишає за собою можливість точкового втручання на ринок в разі виникнення дисбалансу між попитом і пропозицією", - додав банкір. Лєсовий припускає, що протягом 14-20 жовтня обсяг валютних інтервенцій не зазнає змін: обсяг у 150-180 млн долар на день є цілком прийнятним і досить звичним для останніх кількох тижнів. Прогноз курсу Банкір прогнозує, що основні характеристики ринку валют із 14 по 20 жовтня будуть такими: Таким чином, на ринку збережеться прогнозована ситуація. Дії Нацбанку можна назвати "седативними", що не збуджують, а навпаки заспокоюють ринок,...

title: Miroslav spadl z 6 metrů na beton: Otřesná zranění a zázrak v olomoucké nemocnici
content: Osud Miroslava M. (62) z Tovačova visel na vlásku. Po šokujícím pádu z šesti metrů a téměř roce v nemocnici, kde lékaři ztratili naději, se stal zázrak. Miroslav se nejen zotavil, ale na konci září 2024 odešel domů po svých. Příběh, který by mohl být námětem filmu, obletěl celou republiku.

title: As it happens: Malaysians march for pro-Palestine ‘Himpunan 1 Tahun Taufan Al Aqsa’ rally
content: KUALA LUMPUR, Oct 12 — Malaysians are expected to attend a pro-Palestine rally starting from Kuala Lumpur City Centre’s (KLCC) Asy-Syakirin Mosque until the United States Embassy nearby in Jalan Tun Razak. The rally is scheduled for 2pm, after Muslims perform the Zuhur prayers here. Named “Himpunan 1 Tahun Taufan Al Aqsa”, it serves to commemorate the “Al Aqsa Storm” (also called Flood or Deluge) — the October 7, 2023 armed incursion by Hamas and Palestinian nationalists into Israel, which has since sparked a one-year brutal retaliation by Israeli forces into Gaza and Lebanon. What is happening? Malay Mail team on the ground will update this section as soon as the rally starts. What is the rally about? What are their demands? The organisers have not listed any of their demands for the US Embassy, besides condemnation for Washington for siding with the Zionist regime. This, however, isn't the first time Malaysians march towards the US Embassy to show their frustration against Israel's aggression. Just yesterday, hundreds had marched from the Tabung Haji Mosque to the same embassy. In its memorandum, this rally called Himpunan Mega Solidariti Palestin Setahun Genosid Gaza (Mega Rally of Solidarity One Year after Gaza Genocide) demanded: Last December, over 100 Malaysians joined Kepung Demi Palestin’s five-day picket outside the US Embassy in response to the continued US veto to attempts for a ceasefire in the ongoing Gaza-Israel war. Who are the organisers? The rally seems to...

title: UD Lectureship to discuss 'Presbyterian Identity Today'
creator: Telegraph Herald
content: The 2024 Florence L. Warren Lectureship at the University of Dubuque Theological Seminary, titled “Presbyterian Identity Today,” will be held from 11 a.m. to 3 p.m. Monday, Oct. 21. The free lectureship will begin with a panel discussion from 11 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. in the Straatmeyer Rehearsal Room, Heritage Center, 2255 Bennett St. The session also will be livestreamed at facebook.com/DubuqueSeminary . The panelists will include John Burgess, Ph.D., a teaching elder in the Presbyterian Church (USA) and professor of systematic theology at Pittsburgh Theological Seminary; Alyson Janke, a ruling elder and stated clerk in John Knox Presbytery; Bradley Longfield, Ph.D., a teaching elder in the PC (USA), professor of church history at UDTS and co-director of the master in arts in reformed theology program at UDTS; Joseph Small, a teaching elder in the PC (USA); and Charles Wiley, Ph.D., a teaching elder in the PC (USA) and senior director for leadership and support at Columbia Theological Seminary. The panel will be moderated by the Rev. Beth McCaw, a teaching elder in the PC (USA), associate professor of ministry at UDTS, dean of UDTS and vice president of the University of Dubuque. Additionally, there will be an interactive workshop in response via Zoom from 2 to 3 p.m. Registration is required to attend the panel discussion in person and to participate in the workshop via Zoom. Register by sending an email to UDTS@dbq.edu by Tuesday, Oct. 15. Indicate whether you plan to attend...

title: Sports briefs: Florida spring training sites avoid major hurricane damage
creator: The Associated Press
content: Major League Baseball spring training facilities on Florida’s west coast appear to have been mostly spared major damage during Hurricane Milton. Unlike two years ago when Hurricane Ian caused extensive damage that shut down the Tampa Bay Rays’ spring home in Port Charlotte, no teams have reported Milton causing serious issues that might impact operations this winter. The Rays continue to assess the situation at their training complex and stadium, as well as at Tropicana Field in St. Petersburg, where Milton shredded the roof of the domed stadium that’s been their regular-season home since the franchise’s inception in 1998. Several other teams are assessing situations at their spring training complexes. CLEVELAND — Detroit Tigers slugger Kerry Carpenter was undergoing treatment Friday and resting a hamstring injury that could keep him out of Saturday’s decisive Game 5 of the AL Division Series against the Cleveland Guardians. Carpenter, who hit a three-run homer to win Game 2, got hurt while rounding third and scoring in the sixth inning on Thursday night. His run gave Detroit the lead before the Guardians rallied to win 5-4 and even the back-and-forth series. Manager A.J. Hinch said the team is waiting to see how Carpenter’s injury responds before making any lineup or roster decisions. CLEVELAND — Citing a chance of inclement weather, Major League Baseball moved the start time of Saturday’s decisive Game 5 of the AL Division Series between Detroit and Cleveland from 7:08...

title: Nobel Peace Prize given to Japanese organization Nihon Hidankyo for its work against nuclear weapons
creator: BY MIKE CORDER and ELENA BECATOROS The Associated Press
content: The Nobel Peace Prize was awarded Friday to Nihon Hidankyo, a Japanese organization of survivors of the U.S. atomic bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki, for its activism against nuclear weapons. Jørgen Watne Frydnes, chair of the Norwegian Nobel Committee, said the award was made as the “taboo against the use of nuclear weapons is under pressure.” Last month, Russian President Vladimir Putin announced a shift in his country’s nuclear doctrine in a move aimed at discouraging the West from allowing Ukraine to strike Russia with longer-range weapons . It appeared to significantly lower the threshold for the possible use of Russia’s nuclear arsenal. Watne Frydnes said the Nobel committee “wishes to honor all survivors who, despite physical suffering and painful memories, have chosen to use their costly experience to cultivate hope and engagement for peace.” Hidankyo’s Hiroshima branch chairperson Toshiyuki Mimaki was standing by at the city hall for the announcement and teared up when he received the news. “Is it really true? Unbelievable!” Mimaki screamed.

title: First Episcopal women priests' story told in documentary to be screened by Grace Episcopal
creator: Telegraph Herald
content: GALENA, Ill. — Grace Episcopal Church, 107 S. Prospect St., will host a free screening of the documentary “The Philadelphia Eleven” at 2 p.m. Sunday, Oct. 20. In 1974 at a church in Philadelphia, a group of 11 women were ordained to the Episcopal priesthood in violation of the constitution and canons of the Episcopal Church — which at the time stated that only men were eligible for ordination. This is the story that is told in “The Philadelphia Eleven.” Exclusion of women from ordination and other church leadership roles made headlines earlier this summer when the Southern Baptist Convention banned women from the most senior leadership roles. Women in many parts of the Christian church continue to fight for full inclusion in the sacraments and leadership of the church. For more information, visit philadelphiaelevenfilm.com .

title: Iowa needed a veteran guard, and Lucy Olsen and her mid-range game was a good fit
creator: BY JOHN BOHNENKAMP The Associated Press
content: IOWA CITY — Iowa found an experienced point guard in the spring to fill Caitlin Clark’s position. But while Villanova transfer Lucy Olsen finished only a couple of spots behind Clark in the rankings of the nation’s leading scorers last season, her offensive game is much different than the long-distance range of her predecessor. Olsen, who averaged 23.3 points per game last season, made just 29.4% of her 3-point shots last season. Where much of her scoring comes from, though, is with a mid-range jumper that has become one of Olsen’s main talents. “Not a lot of people have it, so it’s definitely a perk to have that mid-range game,” Olsen said. The memories of Clark, the national player of the year who led the Hawkeyes to back-to-back appearances in the national championship game, were still lingering over the program during its media day on Thursday. Head coach Jan Jensen, though, brought up her “We got next” philosophy that she has preached with her players. “I think what’s important, especially with them, is that you just kind of keep them looking in the windshield,” said Jensen, who was elevated from associate head coach in May after Lisa Bluder retired. “We talked a lot about just taking that rear-view mirror down, especially for the play of returners, but even for the freshmen, because it’s all new and you’ve got to keep looking ahead. The next opportunity is what I really want them to focus on, and reminding them that it is a process.” Olsen is one of the Hawkeyes’...

title: Israeli forces kill 2 Lebanese soldiers and injure 2 UN peacekeepers in new, separate strikes
creator: BY BASSEM MROUE The Associated Press
content: BEIRUT — An Israeli airstrike killed two Lebanese soldiers and wounded three on Friday, Lebanon’s military said, just hours after the Israeli military fired on the headquarters of U.N. peacekeepers in southern Lebanon, injuring two of them for the second day in a row . The incidents entangling both Lebanon’s official army — which has largely stayed on the sidelines of the conflict between Israel and Iran-backed Hezbollah — and the U.N. peacekeeping mission in Lebanon raised alarm as Israel broadens its campaign against Hezbollah with waves of heavy airstrikes across the country and a ground invasion at the border. In central Beirut, rescue workers combed Friday through the rubble of a collapsed building, searching for survivors of an Israeli airstrike that killed at least 22 people and wounded dozens in the Lebanese capital the night before. Hezbollah has been firing rockets into Israel over the past year in solidarity with the Palestinians in Gaza following Hamas’ devastating Oct. 7 attacks on southern Israel that killed 1,200 people and resulted in 250 taken hostage. In return, Israel’s military has pounded Hezbollah targets in Lebanon , killing more than 2,229 Lebanese — including Hezbollah fighters, civilians and medical personnel — according to the Lebanese health ministry. That includes 60 people killed and 168 wounded by Israeli airstrikes in the past 24 hours alone, the ministry said. Hezbollah attacks have killed 29 civilians as well as 39 Israeli soldiers in Israel...

title: A comparison says it all

content: Under Biden-Harris, 94 of Trumps executive orders for controlling the southern border were reversed. Harris cast the deciding vote (the Senate was tied, and the VP casts the tie breaker) on the inflation reduction act (nothing in it reduced inflation, but instead created more). The fossil fuel industry has been curtailed by regulations causing energy prices to jump by approximately 50%. The Afghanistan withdrawal was a complete disaster with the loss of life of 13 members of the service. Sanctions on Iran were not enforced. Iran became wealthy again, and funds used to arm HAMAS, Hezbollah, and the Houthis who are terrorizing Israel and ships in the Red Sea. Harris appeared on “60 Minutes” this past Sunday and was asked if she would have done anything differently from what Biden had done. Her answer was that there wasn’t anything she could think of. People have said or reported that the Trump presidency was ‘chaotic’ with the turnover of personnel. Turnover in Harris’ staff as VP has been over 90 percent. While she was in the Senate, Harris had the ninth highest turnover in staff. When asked questions such as “Are you better off now than four years ago?”, her answer has been “Well, you know I grew up in a middle class family......”! Not sure as how that tells me that she believes that things are better now. title: Доллар будет постепенно дорожать: банкир дал прогноз на середину октября
content: Во второй половине октября, несмотря на рост инфляционного давления - новую волну роста потребительских цен, вызванных изменениями в налогообложении, ситуация на валютном рынке будет оставаться вполне умеренной. Об этом в комментарии РБК-Украина сказал Тарас Лесовой, начальник департамента казначейства Глобус Банка. "Незначительные колебания, которые происходили в течение прошлой недели, будут сохранены. Однако все же на рынке будет продолжаться, хоть и очень медленный, но ожидаемый процесс роста стоимости основных валют ", - сказал он. По его словам, в недельном измерении он будет малозаметным или, что не исключено, почти статическим. Но в разрезе день ко дню колебания будут происходить как в сторону роста, так и в сторону уменьшения курсов. "Рынок "живой", а действительный режим "управляемой гибкости" – это сохранение рыночных принципов курсообразования (в зависимости от соотношения спроса и предложения), хотя и с важной оговоркой, ведь регулятор оставляет за собой возможность точечного вмешательства на рынок в случае возникновения дисбаланса между спросом и предложением", - добавил банкир. Лесовой предполагает, что в течение 14-20 октября объем валютных интервенций не претерпевает изменений: объем в 150-180 млн долларов в день вполне приемлем и достаточно привычен для последних нескольких недель. Прогноз курса Банкир прогнозирует, что основные характеристики рынка валют с 14 по 20 октября будут следующими: Таким образом, на рынке сохранится прогнозируемая...

title: 使うのはゴム1本のみ......!? 超簡単なヘアアレンジ3種に「すごい!」「試してみる」の声【海外】
content: ゴム1本でできるヘアアレンジ3種の紹介動画 がTikTokに投稿されました。動画は記事執筆時点で18万2000回以上再生され、6600件以上のいいねを集めています。 動画が投稿されたのはTikTokアカウント「mariaaiellohair」( @mariaaiellohair )さん。このアカウントには、mariaaiellohair(マリア)さんによるヘアアレンジの数々が投稿されています。 今回紹介するのは、ゴム1本でできるヘアアレンジ3種。動画を見ながらすぐに試したくなっちゃうかわいさです。 1つ目のアレンジはハーフアップです。一度ハーフアップで結び、顔周りは少し残します。その後、結んだゴムを少しずらして、ハープアップにした髪を下から上にくるりんぱ。上に出てきた髪で結び目を隠すように整えたら完成です。 2つ目は前髪のアレンジ。前髪をすべて横に流して三つ編みにします。できた三つ編みをほぐしてふんわりさせたら、サイドの髪の上半分を持ち上げ、耳のうしろの髪を少しとって三つ編みと一緒に結びます。そして先ほど持ち上げたサイドの髪をおろして結び目を隠せば完成。 3つ目です。顔周り以外の髪をすべてアップにして一度クリップでとめておきます。顔周りの髪をアップにした髪の下で結んだら、髪をおろして完成。 どれも簡単なのにかわいいアレンジで、見ているだけでもワクワクしますね。髪の長さや髪質によっては同じようにできないかもしれませんが、マリアさんと同じ毛量多めのロングヘアならぜひ試してみてください。 コメント欄では「すごい!」「私の髪は細くて長いけど試してみたい」「あなたのヘアスタイル大好き!」「短い髪でも似合うアレンジも知りたい」などの声が見られました。マリアさんの簡単ヘアアレンジに多くの人が関心を寄せた動画でした。 Copyright © ITmedia, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

title: Anna Lewandowska z "Pytania na śniadanie" pokazuje kulisy i wspomina... Magdę Gessler
content: Anna Lewandowska od lat prezentuje w " Pytaniu na śniadanie " wieści ze świata gwiazd. Teraz będzie to robić w całkiem nowym studio. — Czuję się tu fantastycznie. To jest mój taki drugi zawodowy dom. Bardzo się cieszę, że to jest taka ogromna przestrzeń, bo bałam się, że nam zmniejszą studio, ale na szczęście ma ponad 400 m kw. Czuć świeżość, nowość, mamy nowy puszysty czerwony dywan, wielką plazmę, więc będzie cudownie — zapowiada. Prezenterka zabrała nas m.in. do programowej kuchni. — To jest zdecydowanie nasze ulubione miejsce w studiu, dlatego że zawsze w trakcie przerw wszyscy się tutaj spotykamy. Bardzo często zapraszamy też gości, którzy do nas przychodzą. No i obiadamy się. Tu naprawdę wszystko jest świeże — mówi. Pokazując sprzęt, jaki jest schowany w szafkach, przyznaje: — Jeśli chodzi o blendery, to akurat zazwyczaj jest taka sytuacja, że one u nas nie działają . Mam nadzieję, że w nowym studiu będą działały. Zapytana o to, które smaki są jej najbliższe, wskazuje, że włoskie i polskie. — Uwielbiam robić saltimbocke i robię ją świetną. Gotuję przepyszny rosół. Zawsze miks mięs, mnóstwo warzyw — wylicza, po czym niespodziewanie wspomina o jednej z największych gwiazd TVN. Krupnik gotuję według przepisu Magdy Gessler. Tak, z naszej konkurencji, pani Magdo, serdecznie pozdrawiam. Pani Magda zawsze mówiła, żeby gotować krupnik na żeberkach cielęcych i dodajemy tam właśnie grzyby. Mam nadzieję, że...

title: Analysis: Some quarterbacks just need a second chance, or third or fourth
creator: BY ROB MAADDI The Associated Press
content: Sam Darnold is realizing his potential on his fourth stop. Baker Mayfield and Geno Smith did the same. Jared Goff found his way on his second team. Some quarterbacks just need a second chance. Or third. Or fourth. Darnold was supposed to be a stopgap player in Minnesota, signed to a one-year, $10 million deal to keep a seat warm for J.J. McCarthy. But the rookie first-round pick suffered a season-ending knee injury in August and Darnold has seized the opportunity. The Vikings (5-0) are the NFC’s only undefeated team going into their bye week and Darnold is a major reason why they’ve had success. He has completed 63.5% of his passes for 1,111 yards, 11 touchdowns and four interceptions with a 103.4 passer rating. “I knew all along if we could get some guys open, Sam Darnold’s going to hit them because he’s talented. He can play quarterback in the NFL, I’ve always believed that. I’m just proud of him,” Vikings coach Kevin O’Connell said on Pat McAfee’s show this week. “He’s kind of not really worried about anything other than just his role on our team. He’s one of our captains. He works as hard as anybody to be ready to go. I’m not surprised when he goes out and has success.” Selected by the Jets with the No. 3 overall pick in 2018, Darnold lasted just three seasons in New York. He played for two coaches — Todd Bowles and Adam Gase — on teams that went 13-35. Darnold then spent two seasons in Carolina, playing for two coaches — Matt Rhule and Steve Wilks — and three offensive...

title: Partial remains of British climber believed found 100 years after Everest ascent
creator: BY PAN PYLAS The Associated Press
content: LONDON — Climbers believe they have found the partial remains of a British mountaineer who might — or might not — have been one of the first two people to climb Mount Everest a century after his attempt on the world’s highest peak, according to an expedition led by National Geographic. Ahead of the release of a documentary film, the television channel said Friday the expedition found a foot encased in a sock embroidered with “AC Irvine” and a boot that could be that of Andrew “Sandy” Irvine, who disappeared at the age of 22 along with his co-climber George Mallory near Everest’s peak on June 8, 1924. The pair, who were seeking to become the first people to conquer Everest , were last seen around 800 feet from the summit. Their fate has been debated by climbers and historians alike with some postulating that they had stood atop of the world before disappearing on the way down. In his final letter to his wife before he vanished on Mount Everest a century ago, a 37-year-old Mallory, who once famously said he wanted to conquer Everest “because it’s there,” tried to ease her worries even as he said his chances of reaching the world’s highest peak were “50 to 1 against us.” Mallory’s body was found in 1999 but there was no evidence that could point to the two having reached Everest’s summit at 29,032 feet.

title: College football preview capsules: Washington visits Iowa for 1st time since 1964
creator: TH news services
content: Here is a capsule look at today’s games of interest: Kickoff — 11 a.m. TV — Fox Radio — WDBQ-FM 107.5 Series record — Tied, 3-3. What’s at stake — Washington hopes to carry over its performance from last week’s win over nationally ranked Michigan in a rematch of the College Football Playoff championship game. The Huskies make their first appearance at Kinnick Stadium since 1964. Iowa, which lost 35-7 at Ohio State last week, hasn’t dropped back-to-back regular-season games since October 2022. The Hawkeyes will need to get their offense going after totaling just 226 yards against the Buckeyes. Key matchup — Washington QB Will Rogers vs. Iowa pass defense. Rogers is completing 74% of his passes for 271 yards per game with 12 touchdowns against one interception, and he’s among the national leaders in big plays. The Hawkeyes let Ohio State QB Will Howard complete his first 10 passes and last eight passes in an efficient 21-for-25 performance. They can’t let that happen against Rogers, who’s No. 2 among active quarterbacks in career passing yards and touchdowns. Kickoff — 11 a.m. TV — Big Ten Network Radio — WGLR-FM 97.7 Series record — Wisconsin leads, 5-0. What’s at stake — This might be Rutgers’ best chance to beat the Badgers. Wisconsin lost starting quarterback Tyler Van Dyke to a knee injury early in the season and then had top top running back Chez Mellusi step away from the team recently in attempt to heal from injuries. The Scarlet Knights are 8-2 at home since 2023 and...

title: Abortion has passed inflation as the top election issue for women under 30, survey finds
creator: BY GEOFF MULVIHILL The Associated Press
content: Abortion has passed inflation to become the top issue in the presidential election for women younger than 30 since Vice President Kamala Harris replaced President Joe Biden at the top of the Democratic ticket, according to results released Friday of a survey of female voters by KFF. About 2 in 5 in the group of young voters said abortion was their top concern in the recent survey, compared with 1 in 5 who ranked it most important in the same survey in the spring. In the earlier edition, inflation was the top concern for younger voters, as it was for women voters of all ages. Inflation remained the top concern for women in each age group over 30 and for women overall. Women overall ranked abortion as their No. 3 concern after inflation and threats to democracy, but ahead of immigration. KFF, a health policy research, polling and news organization, surveyed 678 female voters Sept. 12 through Oct. 1. Most of them were participants in an earlier wave of the same poll conducted in May and June. The follow-up survey group was supplemented with 29 Black women to ensure an adequate sample size of that group. The sampling error was plus or minus 5 points, with larger ranges for subgroups of voters. Abortion has long been a major issue, but the landscape shifted in 2022 when the U.S. Supreme Court, powered by three justices nominated by Harris’ opponent, former President Donald Trump, overturned Roe v. Wade and opened the door for states to impose abortion bans. Most...

title: This German church is the tallest in the world. Until Spain's La Sagrada Familia is done, anyway
creator: BY STEFANIE DAZIO AND PIETRO DE CRISTOFARO The Associated Press
content: ULM, Germany — The Ulmer Münster in southern Germany is the world’s tallest church. For now, anyway. The Gothic-style Lutheran church’s reign — begun in May 31, 1890 — could end in 2025, when La Sagrada Familia Basilica’s “Tower of Jesus Christ” in Spain is set to be completed. At an eventual 566 feet high, the Catholic basilica in Barcelona should inch out the Ulmer Münster by a mere 136 feet. But La Sagrada Familia ‘s construction has taken 142 years and counting. The ultimate completion could come in 2026, 100 years since the death of the original Catalan architect, Antoni Gaudí. Ironically, when the basilica reaches its final height , it will be thanks to a 55.77-foot cross that was made by a German company. Still, the Ulmer Münster’s lead pastor isn’t upset. “I don’t find it all that fascinating that it is the highest church tower in the world,” Dean Torsten Krannich told The Associated Press. “The church also lifts my heart up to God. This is simply a wonderful church that invites you to pray and be thankful.” After all, Ulm will always have Albert Einstein. The physicist was born there in 1879 and lived in Ulm for the first 15 months of his life. His extended family remained, and he returned and climbed the church’s tower in 1923. In addition to a stained glass window inside the Ulmer Münster that features Einstein and other famous scientists, the head of communications for Ulm’s tourism board is quick to point out that the rest of the city has “a very high...

title: Reprezentant Polski zmieni klub? Postawił sprawę jasno
creator: Michał Chmielewski
content: 15 - tyle występów w reprezentacji Polski do tej pory zgromadził , na którego Michał Probierz stawiał w meczach ze Szkocją (3:2) i Chorwacją (0:1). Zawodnik Hellasu Werona pojawił się także na październikowym zgrupowaniu. Najprawdopodobniej będzie mógł zanotować kolejne mecze w kadrze, która w Lidze Narodów zagra z Portugalią oraz spróbuje zrewanżować się Chorwatom za wrześniową porażkę 0:1. Dawidowicz zdradził plany na przyszłość. Szykuje się transfer O ile w reprezentacji 29-latek ma dobry czas, tak tego samego nie można powiedzieć o jego formie i sytuacji w klubie. Pod koniec września fatalnie zaprezentował się w ligowym przeciwko Torino. W 20. minucie, przy wyniku 1:1 nagle uderzył łokciem w twarz Antonio Sanabrię. - Po prostu idiotyczne zachowanie - podsumowali komentatorzy. Idąc dalej, nie należy zapominać o tym, że kontrakt Dawidowicza z Hellasem wygasa 30 czerwca 2025 roku. Żadna ze stron nie garnie się do przedłużenia umowy. Czy w takiej sytuacji latem przyszłego roku nasz kadrowicz stanie się wolnym agentem? - Z końcem czerwca wygaśnie mój kontrakt, więc wszystko wskazuje na to, że tak - powiedział wprost w ostatnim wywiadzie z W obszernej rozmowie 29-latek zdradził także kulisy ostatniego okna transferowego, podczas którego w teorii mógł rozglądać się za nowym pracodawcą. - Tak naprawdę to byłem przekonany, że klub będzie chciał mnie oddać. Wahałem się nawet, czy zapisać dziecko do żłobka, bo przenosiny do...

title: County engineer presents Wapello bypass concerns to supervisors
content: WAPELLO — Following up on an Oct. 1 formal listening meeting conducted by the Iowa Department of Transportation (DOT) on the U.S. Highway 61 realignment, Louisa County Engineer Adam Shutt presented a draft letter Tuesday to the county board of supervisors, listing a variety of comments and other actions identified by the county for consideration by the state agency. Shutt stressed the letter was still in draft form and subject to change, but it contained four primary points along with three others Shutt indicated would likely need additional discussions as planning moved forward. The four primary points Shutt identified in the draft included the need for turn lanes and other safety features at the highway’s intersection with 40th Street. He pointed out in the letter the intersection is at the bottom of a steep hill locally known as Jamison Hill and should be similar to intersections south of Sperry or Flint Bottom Road. He also explained 40th Street is a Farm-to-Market road that serves school, agricultural and business traffic; and will remain a busy semi-truck and farm crossing after the realignment is completed. Another concern he outlined in the letter involved the proposed Business 61 intersection near the planned south diamond interchange now included in the realignment. Shutt suggested a new design using a 90-degree intersection rather than a more sweeping curve. He indicated his alternate design would likely reduce the amount of farmland needed for the intersection...

title: پزشکیان از حامیان سهم‌خواهش گله داشت/ ما، شریانی‌ها را جزو خودمان نمی‌دانیم/ هیچ‌وقت با قالیباف دشمنی نداشتم/ همه اعضای پایداری حامی جلیلی نبودند/ مواضع پزشکیان در حمایت از مقاومت قابل تقدیر است
creator: info@fardanews.com (fardanews)
content: گروه سیاست سایت فردا: اخیرا اعضای جبهه پایداری انقلاب اسلامی با مسعود پزشکیان دیدار و گفت‌وگو داشتند. در آن دیدار هم رئیس‌جمهور مطالباتی را از گروه‌های سیاسی مطرح کرد و هم جبهه پایداری به خصوص درباره موضوع وفاق ملی نظرات خود را مطرح کرد. حالا پرسش آن است که جبهه پایداری در ادامه مسیر می‌خواهد چه نسبتی با دولت چهاردهم برقرار کند؟ برای پاسخ به این پرسش و بیش از اینها با غلامحسین رضوان ی ، از اعضای جبهه پایداری و از حاضران در جلسه اخیر، گفت‌وگو کردیم که مشروح آن را در ادامه می‌خوانید. *** باتوجه به دیدار اخیر اعضای جبهه پایداری با آقای پزشکیان، نسبت جبهه پایداری با دولت چهاردهم را چه‌طور می‌بینید؟ باتوجه به اینکه سوال آغازین شما مشخصا درباره جبهه پایداری است باید بگویم که دروغ و تهمت‌های فراوانی در این سال‌ها به نیروهای جبهه پایداری زده‌اند؛ مثل اینکه کابینه دولت آقای رئیسی در دست پایداری‌هاست؛ در صورتی که یک نفر هم از جبهه پایداری در کابینه دولت سیزدهم حضور نداشت. جبهه پایداری تشکیلاتی انقلابی است که در چارچوب نظام و انقلاب اسلامی فعالیت می‌کند و باور دارد که دولت‌های مخلتف در این چارچوب، دولت‌های جمهوری اسلامی‌اند؛ فارغ از آنکه چه کسی رئیس‌جمهور باشد و جبهه پایداری با این نگاه می‌خواهد که همه دولت‌ها موفق شوند زیرا موفقیت آنها موفقیت نظام اسلامی است. دولت چهاردهم هم از این قاعده مستنثنی نیست و ما خود را موظف می‌دانیم در چارچوب‌های قانونی هر کمکی که لازم است به دولت ارائه دهیم. ما مثل برخی غربگراها نیستیم که هنوز در فضای قبل از انتخابات باشیم. ما مثل آنها نیستیم که اگر نتیجه انتخابات باب میل‌شان بود و نامزدشان پیروز انتخابات شد بگویند عجب انتخابات خوبی بود و اگر...

title: Hull KR not weighed down by history in bid to smash through glass ceiling
creator: James O'Brien

title: Cosa dicono le stelle per il 12 ottobre
content: Cosa ci aspetta oggi, 12 ottobre, secondo lo Zodiaco. Ariete – Vi sentite il cuore pesante e non capite perché. Avete fatto tutto il possibile per sistemare gli irrisolti... Toro – Siete cresciuti anche grazie ai no, ma col tempo avete iniziato a temere il rifiuto. Provate ad andare oltre... Gemelli – Aspettate da tempo il momento propizio, ma vi manca sempre il coraggio. È ora di darsi una mossa, no? Cancro – Alcuni amici vi hanno raccontato qualcosa di davvero importante. Non fate l’errore di sbandierarlo al vento. Leone – Qualsiasi idea si faccia chi non vi conosce non dovete considerarla: i vostri comportamenti hanno una storia... Vergine – Vi aspetta una giornata un po’ particolare. Apparentemente vi sembrerà nella norma, ma attenzione ai dettagli... Bilancia – Vi continuate a lamentare e non avete nemmeno fatto un tentativo. Solo dopo potrete dire la vostra. Scorpione – Vi sentite pigri e con l’unico desiderio di guardare serie tv a più non posso. Chiamate un amico e uscite! Sagittario – Vi ostinate a vedere problemi dove non ci sono. Perché non prendete la vita un po’ più alla leggera? Capricorno – Le ambizioni a volte vi rendono ciechi. Perché calpestare gli altri per raggiungere i vostri scopi? Ragionate... Acquario – Siete dei grandi sognatori, e ogni tanto vi chiedete se siano solo “film” i vostri. Vivete e vi sorprenderete. Pesci – Non vi siete mai concessi di fare errori nella vita, e ora vi ritrovate con la voglia di mollare la presa. Non cedete!

title: No. 11 Iowa State heads to improving West Virginia looking to go 6-0 for the first time since 1938
creator: BY JOHN RABY The Associated Press
content: MORGANTOWN, W.Va. — Iowa State coach Matt Campbell knows how good his team has been on the road. He also needs no reminder what happened to the Cyclones the last time they traveled to West Virginia. The Mountaineers picked apart the Big 12’s top defense in 2021, and an Iowa State team that started that season with a No. 7 ranking tumbled out for good after the 38-31 loss . No. 11 Iowa State (5-0, 2-0 Big 12) again has the league’s best defense and is on the verge of another top-10 ranking with West Virginia (3-2, 2-0) standing in its way tonight. The winner will forge a first-place tie with idle Texas Tech , which is 3-0 in league play. The Cyclones have won six straight road games dating to last season, including a last-second squeaker over archrival Iowa on Sept. 7. “We’ve been in two tough road environments already. There’s value to that,” Campbell said. “What West Virginia will be, will be another level of excitement.” Iowa State is 5-0 for the first time since 1980 and hasn’t started 6-0 since 1938. But Campbell cautions that now isn’t the time to celebrate. “You’re really judged by who you are at the end of the year and who you become through this journey,” Campbell said. West Virginia has won two straight heading into a night game in which it will wear black uniforms in honor of the state’s coal mining industry. The Mountaineers’ losses were to two current unbeaten teams, No. 4 Penn State and No. 22 Pittsburgh. “Our guys aren’t going to blink in these games,” West...

title: Nazi-looted Monet artwork returned to family generations later
creator: BY JACK BROOK The Associated Press
content: NEW ORLEANS — On the eve of World War II, Nazis in Austria seized a pastel by renowned impressionist artist Claude Monet, selling it off and sparking a family’s decadeslong search that culminated this week in New Orleans. At an FBI field office, agents lifted a blue veil covering the Monet pastel and presented Adalbert Parlagi’s granddaughters with the artwork over 80 years after it was taken from their family. Helen Lowe said she felt that her grandfather would be watching and that he would be “so, so proud of this moment.” Monet’s 1865 “Bord de Mer” depicts rocks along the shoreline of the Normandy coast, where Allied forces stormed the beaches of Nazi-occupied France during “D-Day” in 1944, marking a turning point in the war. The Monet pastel is one of 20,000 items recovered by the FBI Art Crime Team out of an estimated 600,000 artworks and millions of books and religious objects stolen by the Nazis . “The theft was not random or incidental, but an integral part of the Nazis’ plan to eliminate all vestiges of Jewish life in Germany and Europe, root and branch,” U.S. State Department Holocaust adviser Stuart E. Eizenstat said in a March speech. After Nazi Germany annexed Austria in 1938, Adalbert Parlagi, a successful businessman and art-lover, and his wife, Hilda, left behind almost everything they owned and fled Vienna, using British license plates to drive across the border, their granddaughters said. Though the Parlagis hadn’t identified as Jewish for years and...

title: "حزب الله" يوافق على وقف اطلاق النار
content: أكدت مصادر مطلعة ان "حزب الله" ابلغ رئيس المجلس النيابي نبيه بري ان الحزب موافق على المبادرة السابقة التي تحدثت عن وقف اطلاق نار مؤقتا من اجل الدخول في مفاوضات جدية في المرحلة المقبلة. وترى المصادر ان وقف اطلاق النار يهدف، وفق المبادرة التي وافق عليها الحزب، الى التفاوض من جديد على الترتيبات السياسية وعلى حل مستدام في لبنان وغزة في الوقت نفسه. title: За ночь над регионами РФ уничтожены и перехвачены 47 БПЛА
content: Средства противовоздушной обороны (ПВО) за ночь уничтожили и перехватили 47 украинских беспилотных летательных аппаратов (БПЛА) над тремя регионами РФ и Азовским морем. Об этом сообщили в Минобороны России. «В течение прошедшей ночи при попытке киевского режима совершить террористическую атаку с применением беспилотных летательных аппаратов по объектам на территории Российской Федерации дежурными средствами ПВО уничтожено и перехвачено 47 украинских БПЛА самолетного типа. 17 БПЛА перехвачены и уничтожены над территорией Краснодарского края, 16 — над акваторией Азовского моря, 12 — над территорией Курской области, два над территорией Белгородской области», — сказали там.

title: Woman pleads guilty to trying to smuggle 29 turtles across a Vermont lake into Canada by kayak
creator: The Associated Press
content: BURLINGTON, Vt. — A woman pleaded guilty on Friday to attempting to smuggle 29 eastern box turtles, a protected species, across a Vermont lake into Canada by kayak. Wan Yee Ng, 41, was arrested on the morning of June 28 at an Airbnb in Canaan as she was about to get into an inflatable kayak with a duffel bag on Lake Wallace, according to a Border Patrol agent’s affidavit filed in federal court. Agents had been notified by Royal Canadian Mounted Police that two other people, including a man who was believed to be her husband, had started to paddle an inflatable watercraft from the Canadian side of the lake toward the U.S., according to court documents. The agents searched her heavy duffel bag and found 29 live eastern box turtles individually wrapped in socks, the affidavit states. Eastern box turtles are known to be sold on the Chinese black market for $1,000 each, the affidavit stated. Her cellphone was seized, and a search by law enforcement found communications showing that she tried to smuggle the turtles into Canada so that they could eventually be sold for a profit in Hong Kong, according to the plea agreement. She pleaded guilty on Friday to one count of unlawfully attempting to export and send 29 eastern box turtles out of the U.S. contrary to law. She is scheduled to be sentenced in December.

title: Wall Street rises to close its latest record-setting week
creator: BY STAN CHOE The Associated Press
content: NEW YORK — U.S. stocks rose to records Friday as big banks rallied following a run of reassuring profit reports. The S&P 500 climbed 0.6% to top its all-time high set earlier in the week and close out its fifth straight winning week, while the Dow Jones Industrial Average jumped 409 points, or 1%, to set its own record. The Nasdaq composite lagged the market with a gain of 0.3% after a slide for Tesla kept it in check. Wells Fargo rose 5.6% after reporting stronger profit for the latest quarter than analysts expected. It benefited from better results from its venture-capital investments and higher fees for investment-banking services, among other things. Banks and other financial giants traditionally kick off each earnings reporting season, and JPMorgan Chase climbed 4.4% after reporting a milder drop in profit than analysts feared. It was the strongest single force pushing upward on the S&P 500. CEO Jamie Dimon said the nation’s largest bank is also still buying back shares of its stock to send cash to investors, but the pace is modest “given that market levels are at least slightly inflated.” BlackRock, meanwhile, rose 3.6% after likewise delivering better profit for the latest quarter than analysts expected. The investment giant ended September managing a record $11.5 trillion in total assets for its customers. The gains for banks helped make up for the drag of Tesla, which tumbled 8.8% and was the heaviest weight on the market. The electric-vehicle maker unveiled its...

title: AI and Transformative Technologies Headline Tech Week Singapore 2024
Ben Stokes might be ready second test against Pakistan
content: England captain Ben Stokes looks to be ready to make a return to the team for the second cricket test against Pakistan. Stokes missed England ́s remarkable victory in the first test in Multan, which was sealed on Friday, after failing to recover from a torn hamstring sustained in August. Talking after the match to British broadcaster Sky Sports, Ollie Pope – who stood in again as captain for Stokes – discussed which players were likely to be in contention for the second test starting Tuesday back in Multan and said Stokes “is looking to come back.” When asked specifically if Stokes will play in the second test, Pope smiled and said sheepishly: “I ́m actually not 100%. He ́s been training really well this week. He ́s as keen as ever to get playing again, so fingers crossed he ́s all good.” Stokes played in all three tests in the series against the West Indies that was won 3-0 by England in July, but missed the entire series when England beat Sri Lanka 2-1 over August and September.

title: Plymouth Argyle have chance to rectify away-day woes coming up
creator: news@plymouthherald.co.uk (Chris Errington)
content: Plymouth Argyle have rediscovered the free-scoring winning form at Home Park which has served them so well over recent seasons with three consecutive victories at the Theatre of Greens. There has been high entertainment and excitement as Wayne Rooney's Pilgrims have beaten Sunderland (3-2), Luton Town (3-1) and Blackburn Rovers (2-1) over the past month. No wonder then that there continue to be sell-out crowds. Argyle's struggles at Home Park under former head coach Ian Foster, which saw them lose five games in a row without scoring a goal in any of them, seem in the distant past. It is vital to their Championship prospects this term they continue to pick up points regularly in front of massed ranks of the Green Army. However, it would certainly make life easier for the Pilgrims could get a few wins on their travels as well, which has been a major issue for them since their promotion to the Championship as League One champions in 2022/23. The statistics are stark, and quite honestly depressing. Argyle have played 27 away league games since the start of last season and have managed just three victories - against Swansea City (1-0), Middlesbrough (2-0) and Rotherham United (1-0). The Pilgrims have drawn eight others and lost 16. They have scored 19 goals and conceded 42 for a goal difference of minus 23 and their points per game average is 0.63. It makes grim reading. Compare that to Argyle's record at Home Park since their return to the Championship. It is 13 wins, six draws...

title: ബലാത്സംഗക്കേസില്‍ സിദ്ദിഖ് പോലീസിന് മുന്നില്‍ വീണ്ടും ഹാജരായി; അറസ്റ്റിന് സാധ്യത
content: തിരുവനന്തപുരം: ലൈംഗിക പീഡനക്കേസില്‍ നടന്‍ സിദ്ദിഖ് അന്വേഷണസംഘത്തിന് മുന്നില്‍ ഹാജരായി. രണ്ടാം തവണയാണ് സിദ്ദിഖ് പോലീസിന് മുന്നില്‍ ഹാജരാകുന്നത്. തിരുവനന്തപുരം കന്റോണ്‍മെന്റ് സ്റ്റേഷനില്‍ പോലീസ് കമ്മിഷണര്‍ ഓഫീസിലാണ് ചോദ്യംചെയ്യലിന് സിദ്ദിഖ് ഹാജരായിരിക്കുന്നത്. സുപ്രീം കോടതിയില്‍ നിന്ന് ഇടക്കാല ജാമ്യം നേടിയതിനുശേഷം കഴിഞ്ഞ തിങ്കളാഴ്ച സിദ്ദിഖിനെ അന്വേഷണസംഘം ചോദ്യം ചെയ്യാന്‍ വിളിപ്പിച്ചിരുന്നു. എന്നാല്‍, പൊലീസ് ആവശ്യപ്പെട്ട രേഖകള്‍ ഹാജരാക്കാത്തതിനാല്‍ ചോദ്യം ചെയ്യാതെ വിട്ടയച്ചു. ആവശ്യപ്പെട്ട രേഖകളുമായി ഇന്ന് ഹാജരാകണമെന്ന് നോട്ടീസ് നല്‍കിയാണ് അന്വേഷണസംഘം അന്ന് വിട്ടയച്ചത്. ചോദ്യം ചെയ്യലിനുശേഷം സിദ്ദിഖിന്റെ അറസ്റ്റ് ഉണ്ടാകുമെന്നാണ് സൂചന. അറസ്റ്റ് ചെയ്താല്‍ കോടതിയില്‍ ഹാജരാക്കും. എന്നാല്‍ സുപ്രീം കോടതിയുടെ ഇടക്കാല ഉത്തരവ് നിലനില്‍ക്കുന്നതിനാല്‍ അന്വേഷണസംഘത്തിന് കസ്റ്റഡിയില്‍ വെക്കാന്‍ ആവശ്യപ്പെടാനാകില്ല. അതിനാല്‍ വിചാരണക്കോടതി ജാമ്യം നല്‍കണമെന്നാണ് സുപ്രീം കോടതിയുടെ ഇടക്കാല ഉത്തരവില്‍ പറയുന്നത്. തിരുവനന്തപുരത്തെ ഹോട്ടലില്‍ വെച്ച് സിനിമയില്‍ അഭിനയിക്കാന്‍ അവസരം വാഗ്ദാനം ചെയ്ത് സിദ്ദിഖ് പീഡിപ്പിച്ചെന്നാണ് യുവതിയുടെ പരാതി. ഇതേത്തുടര്‍ന്ന് നടത്തിയ അന്വേഷണത്തില്‍ ചില സാഹചര്യത്തെളിവുകള്‍ കണ്ടെത്തിയിരുന്നു. ഇതിനിടെ മുന്‍കൂര്‍ ജാമ്യാപേക്ഷയുമായി സിദ്ദിഖ് ഹൈക്കോടതിയിലെത്തിയെങ്കിലും കോടതി ഹര്‍ജി തള്ളി. ഇതിനുശേഷം ഒളിവില്‍ പോയ സിദ്ദിഖ് സുപ്രീംകോടതിയെ സമീപിച്ചു. സിദ്ദിഖിനായി പോലീസ് തിരച്ചില്‍ വ്യാപിപ്പിക്കുകയും ലുക്ക് ഔട്ട് നോട്ടീസ് പുറത്തിറക്കുകയും ചെയ്തിരുന്നു. എന്നാല്‍, പ്രതിയെ അറസ്റ്റ് ചെയ്താലും ജാമ്യത്തില്‍ വിടണമെന്ന് നിര്‍ദേശിച്ച് സുപ്രീംകോടതി കേസ് മാറ്റിവെച്ചതോടെ...

title: ناگلسمان: به اندازه سلطه‌ای که بر بازی داشتیم، گل نزدیم
content: به گزارش ، تیم ملی آلمان شب گذشته (جمعه) در سومین هفته از رقابت‌های مرحله گروهی لیگ ملت‌های اروپا، میهمان بوسنی‌و هرزگوین بود و موفق شد میزبان خود را با نیتجه 2 بر یک شکست دهد. این نتیجه در شرایطی رقم خورد که ژرمن‌ها با زدن دو گل در 6 دقیقه در اواسط نیمه نخست، از حریف پیش افتادند و در دقیقه 70 دروازه‌شان توسط ادین ژکو باز شد. با این نتیجه مانشافت 7 امتیازی شد و با توجه به توقف هلند مقابل مجارستان، به صدر جدول گروه C رسید. اختلاف گل دو تیم اما به طور قطع بسیار کمتر از اختلاف سطح عملکرد آنها بود چرا که آلمانی‌ها در این بازی 74 درصد تملک توپ، چهار شوت داخل چارچوب (در مقایسه با تنها یک شوت بوسنیایی‌ها) و حملات و موقعیت‌های گلزنی بسیار بیشتر داشتند. دقیقاً همین موضوع تنها مورد نارضایتی یولیان ناگلسمان، سرمربی ژرمن‌ها پس از بازی بود. ناگلسمان گفت: بازی را به اندازه کافی خوب آغاز نکردیم و در 10 دقیقه نخست، بیش از اندازه توپ را در یک سوی میدان نگه می‌داشتیم. وقتی که این مشکل را برطرف کردیم، اوضاع بهتر شد و از آن به بعد کاملاً بر بازی مسلط شدیم. سرمربی آلمان افزود: به اندازه سلطه‌ای که بر بازی داشتیم، گل‌ نزدیم و تعداد گل‌های‌مان کم بود. در مورد گلی هم که دریافت کردیم، هنگام ضدحمله حریف، باید مسیر حرکت ژکو را می‌بستیم نه اینکه او را آزادانه رها کنیم. با این حال تیم توانست کنترلش را بر بازی حفظ کند. بین ریسک برای زدن گل‌‌های بعدی و مراقبت از دروازه برای دریافت نکردن گل تعادل ظریفی وجود دارد که باید رعایت شود. بازی بعدی آلمان روز 23 مهر در خانه برابر اصلی‌ترین رقیبش یعنی هلند است. این دیدار از ساعت 22:15 به وقت تهران برگزار می‌شود. انتهای پیام/

title: IKEA sales fall 5% after price cuts amid weak housing market
Καίτη Φίνου: Μεγάλοι δημοσιογράφοι έγραφαν ψέματα γιατί ήταν καψούρηδες μαζί μου
creator: Μαιρη Καλουτσακη
content: Για τα ψέματα που κατά καιρούς έχουν γραφτεί για εκείνη μίλησε η Καίτη Φίνου και αποκάλυψε γιατί κάποιοι τα έγραφαν. Ανάμεσα σε όσα είδαν το φως της δημοσιότητας αλλά δεν ήταν αλήθεια και η... ιστορία πως σύντροφός της την άφησε γυμνή στο Σούνιο, είπε η Καίτη Φίνου σε συνέντευξη που παραχώρησε στο περιοδικό Λοιπόν. Είναι αλήθεια πως στο παρελθόν δεχόσασταν έντονο φλερτ από γυναίκες; Δεν έδινα σημασία γιατί πάντα ήμουν με κάποια σχέση. Υπήρχαν δημοσιογράφοι μεγάλα ονόματα, οι οποίοι έχουν φύγει από τη ζωή και μου είχαν πει ότι επειδή δεν ήμουν ποτέ ελεύθερη, έγραφαν τα χειρότερα για μένα. Δεν πήγαινε το μυαλό μου ότι έγραφαν αυτά τα ψέματα, τις κακοήθειες επειδή ήταν καψούρηδες μαζί μου, αλλά εγώ τύχαινε να είχα σχέση Ποιο είναι το χειρότερο ψέμα που έχει γραφτεί για εσάς; Πολλά. Είχαν γράψει ότι είχα σχέση με δημοσιογράφο, ο οποίος με πήγε μέχρι το Σούνιο και με έγδυσε, μου πήρε τα ρούχα και με άφησε να περπατήσω γυμνή. Γράφτηκε στον «Θησαυρό». Δεν κινήθηκα νομικά, γιατί πράγματι είχα σχέση με τον συγκεκριμένο δημοσιογράφο. Κάποτε, γύρω στο 2000, μου έδιναν πολλά χρήματα για να γράψω μια σειρά βιβλίων για να μπουν σε εφημερίδα με τα όσα έχω ζήσει. Δεν ήθελα να ξεφτιλίσω όμως κανέναν. Σκέψου ότι την περίοδο του metoo μου έκαναν πρόταση να πάω περιοδεία και, όταν έμαθα ότι θα ήταν κάποιος που απλώς είχε ακουστεί το όνομα του, δεν...

title: A faith is on the edge of vanishing in Georgia after being exiled from Russia centuries ago
creator: BY KOSTYA MANENKOV The Associated Press
content: GORELOVKA, Georgia — A 10-year-old boy proudly stands beside his father and listens to the monotone chanting of elderly women clad in embroidered headscarves and long colorful skirts. It is Ilya’s first time attending a night prayer meeting in Gorelovka, a tiny village in the South Caucasus nation of Georgia, and he is determined to follow the centuries-old hymns that have been passed down through the generations. There is no priest and no iconography. It’s just men and women praying together, as the Doukhobors have done since the pacifist Christian sect emerged in Russia in the 18th century. Thousands of their ancestors were expelled to the fringes of the Russian Empire almost two centuries ago for rejecting the Orthodox church and refusing to serve in Czar Nicholas I’s army — much like the thousands of men who fled Russia two years ago to avoid being drafted to join Moscow’s invasion of Ukraine. Today, only about 100 Doukhobors remain in the tight-knit Russian-speaking farming community in two remote mountainous villages. “Our people are dying,” 47-year-old Svetlana Svetlishcheva, Ilya’s mother, tells The Associated Press, as she walks with her family to an ancient cemetery. Some 5,000 Doukhobors who were banished in the middle of the 19th century established 10 villages close to the border with the hostile Ottoman Empire, where they continued to preach nonviolence and worshiped without priests or church rituals. The community prospered, growing to around 20,000 members....

title: Leticia Barbara Verney: Perth mother sentenced to 3.5 years in prison after attempting to smuggle drugs
creator: Lauren Price
content: A Perth mum caught trying to smuggle drugs into a US prison for a lover she had met online has been jailed for 31⁄2 years. Leticia Verney was arrested in February after attempting to sneak in 200 fentanyl pills, 28g of heroin, an ounce of meth and 7g of marijuana at Lewis Prison in Arizona. Verney, from Fremantle, had travelled across the world with her two children, aged seven and 12, to be with inmate Brandon Dawson after the pair met online. And she routinely took her kids to the prison to visit Dawson. But she was arrested on February 4 after authorities uncovered recordings of her plans to smuggle drugs into Lewis Prison. Verney, 41, was originally charged with promoting prison contraband, money laundering and the sale or transportation of dangerous drugs, but eventually pleaded guilty to the lesser charges of taking contraband into a prison. She first came to the attention of authorities after an investigation was launched in December last year following multiple drug overdoses inside the prison. Last month, The West Australian obtained court documents that revealed the inner workings of Verney and Dawson’s smuggling plot, including how they spoke in code during monitored phone calls on prison phones, referring to the drugs as “bikes”, and discussed if the drugs could be concealed inside themselves. After their mother was arrested, Verney’s children returned to Australia in June to be with family.

title: MLB: Yamamoto outduels Darvish, Dodgers advances
creator: The Associated Press
content: Los Angeles — Yoshinobu Yamamoto outdueled Yu Darvish in a historic playoff matchup of Japanese-born starters, and the Los Angeles Dodgers got home runs from Kiké Hernández and Teoscar Hernández to beat the San Diego Padres. 2-0, on Friday night and advance to the National League Championship Series. Yamamoto allowed two hits over five innings for the Dodgers before being pulled after 63 pitches in a decisive Game 5 between heated rivals who were meeting in an NL Division Series for the third time in five years. The Dodgers will play Pete Alonso and the New York Mets in the best-of-seven NLCS starting Sunday night in Los Angeles. The Dodgers won a decisive Game 5 at home for the first time since taking a 1981 NL Division Series against Houston after a season split into halves following a players’ strike. Boasting the majors’ best regular-season record of 98-64, they successfully avoided a third straight NLDS elimination. The Padres’ big hitters went bust with their season on the line. Three-time batting champion Luis Arraez, Fernando Tatis Jr., Jurickson Profar and Manny Machado were 1 for 14 in Game 5 as the last 19 San Diego batters were retired. San Diego went scoreless for the final 24 innings of the series, dropping the last two games after taking a 2-1 lead back home. Yamamoto and Darvish were the first Japanese-born starting pitchers to square off in major league playoff history. The 26-year-old Yamamoto was the fifth rookie to start a winner-take-all game in...

title: The drownings of 2 Navy SEALs were preventable, military investigation finds
creator: The Associated Press
content: WASHINGTON — Two U.S. Navy SEALs drowned as they tried to climb aboard a ship carrying illicit Iranian-made weapons to Yemen because of glaring training failures and a lack of understanding about what to do after falling into deep, turbulent waters, according to a military investigation into the January deaths. The review concluded the drownings of Chief Special Warfare Operator Christopher J. Chambers and Navy Special Warfare Operator 1st Class Nathan Gage Ingram could have been prevented. But both sank quickly in the high seas off the coast of Somalia, weighed down by heavy equipment they were carrying and not knowing or disregarding concerns that their flotation devices could not compensate for the additional weight. Both were lost at sea. The highly critical and heavily redacted report — written by a Navy officer from outside Naval Special Warfare Command, which oversees the SEALs — concluded there were “deficiencies, gaps and inconsistencies” in training, policies, tactics and procedures as well as “conflicting guidance” on when and how to use emergency flotation devices and extra buoyancy material that could have kept them alive. The Associated Press obtained the report upon request before its public release. The mission’s goal was to intercept weapons headed to the Iranian-backed Houthis in Yemen , who have been launching missile and drone attacks against commercial and U.S. Navy ships in the Red Sea and Gulf of Aden since the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza began a year...

title: Ces étonnantes créatures marines qui fusionnent pour survivre
content: C 'est un phénomène qui n'avait encore jamais été observé auparavant. Des chercheurs viennent de découvrir que des créatures gélatineuses vivant dans les profondeurs océaniques, des cténophores appartenant à l'espèce Mnemiopsis leidyi – que l'on appelle aussi méduses à peigne alors qu'il ne s'agit pas véritablement de méduses –, pouvaient littéralement fusionner leur corps pour survivre lorsqu'elles étaient blessées. Un processus qui les conduit à former ensemble un seul et même organisme de plus grande dimension en combinant durablement leur système nerveux et leur estomac, selon une récente étude publiée dans la revue Current Biology . La découverte a eu lieu par hasard dans un laboratoire du Living Systems Institute au Royaume-Uni, où l'équipe du biologiste Kei Jokura, chercheur à l'université d'Exeter et à l'Institut national des sciences naturelles d'Okazaki au Japon, menait des recherches classiques sur ces créatures marines parmi les plus étranges. Un matin, le scientifique s'est aperçu qu'un cténophore semblait avoir disparu de l'aquarium tandis qu'un individu inhabituellement grand y avait fait son apparition. Intrigué par ce phénomène, Kei Jokura a immédiatement informé ses collègues. En examinant le nouvel animal de plus près, ils ont constaté qu'il présentait deux extrémités aborales – c'est-à-dire deux sorties pour un seul appareil digestif – ainsi que deux organes apicaux, des capteurs situés au sommet du corps...

title: An inside look at Great River Honor Flight Mission 74
creator: By MIKE SORENSEN Herald-Whig Staff Writer msorensen@whig.com

title: Miliony Polaków otrzymają list z ZUS. Wiadomość dotyczy 14. emerytury
creator: Małgorzata Krzystała
content: ZUS każdego roku wysyła podobne listy, bowiem jest to jego prawny obowiązek. Co konkretnie zawiera korespondencja? Informację o przyznanej kwocie 14. emerytury. ZUS musi poinformować każdego beneficjenta, że otrzymał on zgodnie z prawem dodatkowe świadczenie. Oprócz tego musi wskazać dokładną kwotę. Kiedy emeryci i renciści otrzymali świadczenie? Wszyscy uprawnieni emeryci i renciści otrzymali już „czternastkę”. Obecnie trwa wysyłka listów, które informują adresatów o przyznanej kwocie. Świadczenie zostało wypłacone automatycznie, a zatem nie trzeba było składać żadnych wniosków w tej sprawie. Beneficjenci otrzymali je razem z podstawową emeryturą . Wypłaty były rozłożone na kilka transz. Pierwsza została wysłana już 30 sierpnia, bowiem pierwszy termin wypadał w niedzielę 1 września. Kolejne terminy przypadły na 6, 10, 15, 20 i 25 września, choć ze względu na weekend wypłata przypadająca na 15 września została zrealizowana wcześniej, czyli 13 września. Czytaj więcej Emeryci, którzy zdecydują się na odroczenie świadczenia i kontynuowanie pracy zawodowej, mogą skorzystać ze specjalnej ulgi. Ma ona zachęcić seniorów do wydłużenia aktywności zawodowej, zapewniając im przy tym znaczne korzyści. Kto otrzymał 14. emeryturę? 14. emerytura to jednorazowe świadczenie, które przysługuje osobom mającym prawo do emerytury , renty, renty socjalnej i świadczenia przedemerytalnego. Jeśli prawo do otrzymywania jednego z tych...

title: Los 20 años de la reina Letizia en el día de la Hispanidad: polémicas, looks y momentos clave
content: Este sábado 12 de octubre se celebra el tradicional desfile de las Fuerzas Armadas por la Fiesta Nacional de España , cabalgata que se lleva celebrando desde 1997. El acto es presidido por la Familia Real , con el rey Felipe VI como máximo representante de los ejércitos junto a la reina Letizia , y se espera la presencia de autoridades como el Alcalde de Madrid, José Luis Martínez-Almeida, y el Presidente del Gobierno, Pedro Sánchez. Desde su incorporación en 2004 a la Familia Real, la reina Letizia es una asistente infalible y clave en este acto . Su presencia es clave para la imagen de la Casa Real, pues el acto es retransmitido por todos los medios nacionales, en especial la casa RTVE -donde ella trabajó en su juventud- que reúne millones de espectadores cada año . El año pasado hasta 4.290.000 personas conectaron con el directo de la 1 y los contenidos sobre el desfile alcanzaron las 12 millones de visualizaciones en los perfiles de RTVE Noticias en las redes sociales. La Reina Letizia el día nacional de España Tras su boda el 22 de mayo de 2004 con Felipe de Borbón , el entonces Príncipe de Asturias, Letizia Ortiz se incorporó a la vida pública de la Casa Real. Desde ese momento ha participado en tantos actos, viajes y eventos del calendario oficial, donde destaca el anual desfile de las Fuerzas Armadas del 12 de octubre por el Día Nacional. En esta jornada tan señalada, la reina Letizia debe acudir al paso de los cuerpos de seguridad y del ejército...

title: Boeing's lawyers argue for settlement opposed by relatives of those killed in 737 Max crashes
creator: BY DAVID KOENIG The Associated Press
content: FORT WORTH, Texas — Relatives of passengers who died in two crashes of Boeing 737 Max planes came to a federal court in Texas on Friday to listen as their lawyers asked a judge to throw out a plea agreement that the aircraft manufacturer struck with prosecutors and put the company on trial. Their lawyers argued that Boeing’s punishment — mainly a fine amounting to about $244 million — would be too light for misleading regulators about a flight-control system that malfunctioned before the crashes. They accused Boeing and the Justice Department of airbrushing facts and ignoring that 346 people died in the crashes. U.S. District Judge Reed O’Connor asked a Boeing lawyer why he should accept the prepackaged plea deal and a sentence negotiated by a defendant. The Boeing lawyer, Ben Hatch, said Boeing “is a pillar of the national economy and the national defense” and needs to know the punishment before it agrees to plead guilty to conspiracy to commit fraud, a felony. Otherwise, he said, the company could be disbarred from federal contracting. “All the employees of the company, the shareholders of the company and a global and national supply chain ... all of those are put into doubt if the sentencing” isn’t known, possibly for months, Hatch said. The answer stunned and angered relatives of the victims. “Boeing is too important for the economy — they’re too big to jail. That’s what he’s saying,” Michael Stumo, whose daughter Samya died in the second crash, said after the hearing....

title: How do we solve the NHS productivity puzzle?
creator: Chris Stone
content: The NHS is facing the most difficult period in its history. Just days into office, the new government declared the official position of the Department for Health and Social Care is that the NHS is “broken”. While there’s evidence NHS productivity has been growing at a faster rate than other public sectors over the last decade, major barriers still remain. The latest Office for National Statistics figures show NHS productivity in 2021/2022 was still 6.6% below pre-pandemic levels. Emerging trends reveal productivity in healthcare is a complex issue with no single solution. In this episode host Emma Haslett is joined by PwC’s Health Services Sector Leader Julian Hunt, CEO of The Newcastle upon Tyne Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust, Sir Jim Mackey and CEO of The King’s Fund Sarah Woolnough. They discuss the impact of the pandemic, the role of digital solutions and the importance of including staff and patients as new systems are introduced and changes are made. This New Statesman podcast episode is sponsored by PwC. Related
